changelog:
- The Installer is now compatible with Windows 7 and 8.
- The Installer now Removes ALL EDHM files when the UI is Uninstalled.
- EDHM v8.3 for Odyssey is now live.
- On Foot HUD is now available, thanks to @Mystler.
- New/Updated Themes: Veritas, Vaporwave, RedGrayBlack, OrangeBloo, SebiLetPlay's Green, Cornflower_Blue, Cherenkov_Blue.
